--------------------------------------------------
ID: C4O3D4_00
From: Kawttar Nassik <Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>
To: Ahmed Eltahan <Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Romy Ammar <Romy.Ammar@chalhoub.com>; Christopher Matsumoto <Chris.Matsumoto@chalhoub.com>; Kawttar Nassik <Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>
CC: Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Muhammed Sweadan <Muhammed.Sweadan@chalhoub.com>; Group Security Control Room <GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>; RealEmiratesSupplies <RealEmiratesSupplies@chalhoub.com>; Lorena Dimaala <Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-08 14:38
Subject: De Beers Grand Opening event and Gala Dinner preparation
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Team,

 

I would like to express my gratitude for your participation in the recent call. Please find below the tasks that need to be addressed in order to ensure a smooth process for the upcoming event:

 

@Christopher Matsumoto <mailto:Chris.Matsumoto@chalhoub.com>  – Kindly raise a request for additional security for the 16th of April to support the event. Additionally, please submit a form to GSCR regarding activation delays and inform the relevant authority to avoid potential fines. Kindly also send an email to GSCR to confirm the collection time and ensure the return of items, and please schedule a jewellery inspection for the following day.

chunks.text:
@Christopher Matsumoto <mailto:Chris.Matsumoto@chalhoub.com>  – Kindly raise a request for additional security for the 16th of April to support the event. Additionally, please submit a form to GSCR regarding activation delays and inform the relevant authority to avoid potential fines. Kindly also send an email to GSCR to confirm the collection time and ensure the return of items, and please schedule a jewellery inspection for the following day.

 

@Kawttar Nassik <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>  – Please communicate with the mall management to obtain approval for the stock collection and its return to the store in preparation for the event.

 

@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  – Kindly provide the quotation for TG services to Romy for her approval.

 

Thank you all for your attention to these matters. Please let me know if there are any questions or clarifications needed.

 

Best regards,

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI
